name: Dejan Bodiroga, Дејан Бодирога
former_teams: KK Proleter Zrenjanin (1989–1990), KK Zadar (1990–1992), Pallacanestro Trieste (1992–1994), Olimpia Milano (1994–1996), Real Madrid (1996–1998), Panathinaikos (1998–2002), FC Barcelona (2002–2005), Virtus Roma (2005–2007)
awards: Spanish League regular season MVP 1998, 1998 FIBA World Championship MVP, 2-time Greek League MVP 1999, 2000, Euroleague 2001-02 Top 16 MVP, 2002 FIBA World Championship Final MVP, 2-time Euroleague Final Four MVP: 2002, 2003, 3-time All-Euroleague First Team: 2002, 2003, 2004, Spanish Cup MVP 2003, Spanish Supercopa MVP 2004, Spanish League Finals MVP 2004, 50 Greatest Euroleague Contributors 2008
